alert.note: Alert for Fresno; Madera (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 10 at 1:53PM PST until January 10 at 2:30PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hanford CA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Madera County in central California... Northeastern Fresno County in central California... * Until 230 PM PST. * At 153 PM PST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Yosemite Lakes, or 18 miles south of Yosemite South Entrance, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Oakhurst, Yosemite Lakes, Coarsegold, Bass Lake, Crane Valley Reservoir, Bass Lake Ranger District and North Fork. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
